body.name: Clorox Fraganzia Gel Air Freshener Cone in Island Orchid Scent, 6oz | No-Plug, Battery-Free Air Freshener for Small Rooms, Closets, Kitchens, Bathrooms, Offices and More
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 27 - March 5 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: LONG LASTING FRAGRANCE – Each air freshening gel cone exudes lasting fragrance, refreshing your tightest spaces that build odor, from kitchens and bedrooms to bathrooms and offices.
ISLAND ORCHID SCENT – This light and floral scent blend of orchids and tropical fruit is pleasant but not overpowering.
TWIST OPEN AIR FRESHENER CONE – These fragrance cones can be easily placed in small areas that need a fragrance boost by simply twisting open the top and placing it on a surface.
MINI AIR FRESHENERS WITH BIG SCENTS – These air freshening cones are perfect for placing on the backs of sinks, toilets, in offices, bedrooms, garages, closets, and more.
NO MAINTENANCE REQUIRED — These adhesive air fresheners require no batteries or plugs; simply twist open, place in a safe place*, and enjoy lasting fragrance.
body.description: The unique and inviting Clorox Fraganzia scents are here to enhance every area in your home or office, including small rooms like bedrooms, closets, bathrooms, kitchens, offices, and more. These nature-inspired scents such as Island Orchid and Fresh Ocean Breeze exude freshness wherever you choose to use them. Clorox Fraganzia Adhesive Gel Air Freshener Cones will freshen your small rooms with a fragrance that lasts. These compact, lightweight cones can be placed on the backs of toilets or sinks, on shelves in closets, or on furniture and countertops and don't require any batteries, plugs, or day-to-day maintenance. This light and fruity scent of Island Orchid is pleasant but not overpowering. Simply twist open and place wherever you desire fresh, long-lasting scent. Our scent-sational scents have lasting effects that can brighten up any area of the home*. These cone style air fresheners are designed to slowly release the fragrance, ensuring your home stays fresh longer. Directions: Peel off bottom. Twist top from bottom. Pull top up for freshness. *Caution: Keep out of reach of children and pets. May be harmful if swallowed. May irritate eyes. If eye contact occurs, flush with water for 15 minutes. If irritation persists, contact a physician. Do not mix with other chemicals. Love this scent? Check out our other laundry, dish, and air care products in our Island Orchid fragrance! The Clorox and Fraganzia names and logos are registered trademarks of The Clorox Company and are used under license by Brand Buzz CP. All rights reserved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked the cherry burst scent. It lasted much longer that the leading brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I twisted the cap open and it wasn't gel it was liquid
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed because I typycally by a different brand but thought I would try this one. 4 out of 6 were liquiified and not gel as stated. I twisted the bottom and liquid poured out all over the place. Sadly I will not reorder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Air freshener that has a very small scent!
reviews.reviewText: I thought I was getting a bargain. Price is nice but I open 3 and put one in our bathroom and one in each of our closet. Door are closed so I thought I would be able to smell the scent. No smell so I picked up the container and it smells very little. I would not buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for rooms in a nursing home. They are to be soiled airfresheners. When I opened the package there was red dye in the box from the cherry scent. the Units themselves had liquid in them as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: you can’t smell it,it does not kick out a strong scent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nothing else to say, juat smells great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Barely smells of lavender
reviews.reviewText: Not as scented as Glade and Renuzit products. Really can’t detect fragrance unless up close. Would be better for a very small space like a closet. Cannot recommend
